price: 40. En voorwaar, Wij hebben de Koran gemakkelijk gemaakt, is er dan iemand die het onthoudt?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
